info.headline: Back to login
info.info: If the entered email address is valid, you'll receive your password recovery mail within a few minutes.
info.warning: Please note, that the recovery link will only be valid for 2 hours.

recovery.headline: Password recovery
recovery.errorMessage: Your recovery link has expired or is invalid!

recovery.headline: Password recovery
recovery.text: Enter the email address linked to your account.
